short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you use '/' (forward slash) as a shortcut key to focus on search fields on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moving your mouse and focusing on search fields is painfully slow. This extension eliminates this by letting you use / (forward slash) as a shortcut key to focus on search fields on any website.
